thread.section_title: Holidayguru IE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Holidayguru IE | www.holidayguru.ie
thread.title: Laura Burke
thread.title_full: Holidayguru IE reviewed by Laura Burke

author: Laura Burke
title: Laura Burke
text:
I sent an email and they got back to me within a few hours with exactly what I was asking for and more, as always I am more than happy with the service and recommend the Holiday Guru to everyone who needs a little help booking/sourcing holidays
So so helpful and efficient !
Thanks Holiday guru :)
